summary: Implements an attention‑based graph convolution that computes edge weights using a softmax of a scaled cosine similarity between node feature vectors, optionally learning the scaling factor β, and propagates features via the resulting propagation matrix while offering optional handling of zero‑in‑degree nodes.
business_intent: Provide a graph neural network layer that leverages feature similarity for attention‑driven message passing, facilitating semi‑supervised learning on graph-structured data.
